entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening then light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
